title: The Letician Age by Yalitza Ferreras

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Ferreras uses literary elements and techniques to construct a complex portrait of Leticia.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Ferreras uses literary elements and techniques to construct a complex portrait of Leticia.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
